name: Loser Unit Interactive Gallery
description:
This is something I put together for a friend. He was curating an exhibition of street artists, heaps of artists, but only a small gallery. I wanted to show a bunch of the artists previous works, but without taking up space, so I made some virtual space.

It's designed to be pretty janky, but also to fit with the vibes of the show. To make the experience a bit more interesting I created a custom controller with two track balls, one for looking and one for movement, and wow that's not easy to use!

Art is not mine (I wish, I think there's some Ox King in there, it's all good stuff) but the glitched out models and environment is all mine.
